column5: anyone know where I would find some new locks to replace the latch locks for the boat.I have tried CT,Princess Auto,Home hardware.Ones similar to this.  http://www.iboats.com/Marine-Works-Lift-Latch-Locks/dm/cart_id.693162828--session_id.358602291--view_id.45229  would like to get them in a set(4) so one key would be needed . thanks
You'll more than likely get them at  Boaters World or West Marine if your close to either of them.
X2 on West Marine. I would think that any decent sized marina or marine dealer should be able to order them in for you.
sorry didnt se the picture ditto on faucher they are in mississauga on trinity drive we use the same locks on the rescue boat they have them there we just bought 4 keyed alike   Peter
